TopicTitle: How to Make a modded part.

Articles.Content: Can someone explain to me (or show me a video) how to make a part in KSP? I have some awesome ideas for the game but i have no way of making them because i don\'t know how. =P

If you want a new Model, start here.

If you want a part with different characteristics, start here.

If you want a part to run new code, go learn C#, then start here.

Not sorted by level of difficulty.
